original_text: When she was brought forth, she sent to her father in law, saying, By the man, whose these are, am I with child: and she said, Discern, I pray thee, whose are these, the signet, and bracelets, and staff.
korean_text: 여인이 끌려나갈 때에 사람을 보내어 시아버지에게 이르되 이 물건 임자로 말미암아 임신하였나이다 청하건대 보소서 이 도장과 그 끈과 지팡이가 누구의 것이니이까 한지라

sentences.original_text: she sent to her father in law
saying, By the man, whose these are
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들의 주인이 된 그 사람으로 인해

sentences.original_text: and she said, Discern, I pray thee
the signet, and bracelets, and staff.
